messages.title: Personal Endorsements
messages.content: Personal stories and endorsements from local constituents Mariama and Ian highlighting the candidate's assistance and hard work on issues both locally and internationally.

messages.title: Community Engagement
messages.content: Danielle describes the candidate as a tireless campaigner for fairness and equalities who takes a real interest in community affairs and supports local groups.

issues.environment: Joan has always stood up for issues internationally, from improving our local stations to tackling fly tipping to dealing with global climate change.

endorsements.endorsement: When we needed assistance my husband and I contacted Joan. She took up our case and really helped us. I know that she has done the same for people throughout the constituency and will continue to do so.

Joan has always stood up for the issues she believes in, locally, nationally and internationally - from improving our local stations to tackling fly tipping to dealing with global climate change. She always works so hard.

I know that Joan has been a tireless campaigner for fairness and equalities regardless of who you are and where you come from. She takes a real interest in community affairs and has supported so many local groups.
